title: For the Love of Pets
overview: For the Love of Pets follows a cast of colourful characters within the clinics who devote their lives to the animals in their care. From vets performing life-changing surgery to a re-homing unit with a success rate of 4,000-plus pets per year and the small, compassionate team who help families say their final goodbyes,Â For the Love of Pets celebrates the special commitment of those who protect and care for our beloved animals.
